summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Add Team Members onboarding page at /onboarding/add-team. All specified features working perfectly including form validation, role selection, team management, and navigation flows.
passed_tests: Page loads correctly at /onboarding/add-team with title 'Add your team' and descriptive subtitle
Onboarding progress bar shows 4 steps with step 3 (Add Team) active
Step indicator correctly displays 'Step 3 of 4'
Invite form with Full Name and Email inputs with proper validation
Send Invite button correctly disabled when name or email is empty
Send Invite button enabled when both name and email are filled
Role selector with Owner (disabled), Manager, Ops, and Viewer options
Owner role button properly disabled with hover tooltip functionality
Role descriptions display correctly for Manager: 'Can manage products, inventory, and pricing.'
Role descriptions display correctly for Ops: 'Can manage orders, shipments, and returns.'
Role descriptions display correctly for Viewer: 'Read-only access to reports and listings.'
Send Invite functionality creates success banner with invited email address
Form clears after successful invite submission
Team members table displays initial mock members (Alex Rivera - Manager/Active, Sam Chen - Ops/Invited)
New invited members appear in team members list with 'Invited' status
Change role dropdown works correctly on existing team members
Role change functionality successfully updates member roles
Remove member button successfully removes members from list
Success banner dismissal works with X button
Skip for now link navigates correctly to /dashboard
Back button navigates correctly to /dashboard
Continue to Review & Start Sync button navigates correctly to /dashboard
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Form state management and validation working perfectly
Team member count updates correctly after additions and removals
